lines.line: Hey you creature! Make me some stabbers! I wanna hunt da chompy?
Stabbers?
For da stabbie chucker, I's wanna hunt da chompy!
I think I understand. You want me to make some arrows for you?
Yeah, is what Rantz sayed, make da stabbers for da stabby chucker!
OK, I'll make you some 'stabbers'.
Good you creature, you need sticksies from achey tree and stabbies from dog bones.
Er, make you're own 'stabbers'!
Hey you creature... Have you made me da stabbers? I wanna stick da chompy?
Er not exactly?
You do stabbers quick quick! Or Rantz make stabbers for Rantz and then practice for chompy sticking on creature!
How do I make the 'stabbers' again?
Grrr creature... you's no good stabber maker!
Is just what Rantz sayed!
Oh, so I need logs from the achey tree, bones from a canine... and feathers?
Good creature, quickly, hurry bring da stabbers!
Ok, I'll make the 'stabbers' for you.
Hey you Creature, Dad says you's is gonna get da stabbers!
That's right... I'm making some 'stabbers' for Rantz.
Dat's great...Dad want's to hunt da chompy...
Yous needies da scratchers for makin' dem huh?
I's wants some bright pretties for em!
How many 'bright pretties' do you want?
Bugs wants lots of bright pretties, this many!
Ok, I'll give you 10 bright pretties.
You's not got da bright pretties...
I wants da bright pretties..you not get no scratchers wid'out da bright pretties.
Er, sorry, I can't give you that many...
Ok, dat's a good 'un, I got da bright pretties and you got da scratchers!
Well, you not have da scratchers den!
I's sorry creature, I don't got no more scratchers!
But I got lots of bright pretties!
Hope you's get da stabbers for Dad soonly!
You's better talk to Dad, he might have something for you to do.
Hey you Creature, I know's what you is You's a 'uman!
Dat's great...Dad want's to hunt da chompy...
You needsing flufsies for stabbers, Fycie have some but I is wanting some bright pretties for em!
How many 'bright pretties' do you want?
Mee's wants lots of bright pretties, this many!
Ok, I'll give you 50 bright pretties.
You's not got da bright pretties...
I wants da bright pretties..you not get no flufsies wid'out da bright pretties.
Er, sorry, I can't give you that many...
Ok, dat's a good 'un, I got da bright pretties and you got da flufsies!
Well, you not have da flufsies den!
I's sorry creature, I don't got no flufsies!
But I got lots of bright pretties!
Hope you's get da stabbers for Dad soonly!
You's better talk to Dad, him chasey sneaky chompy.
Rantz said that you play with the 'fatsy toadies', what are they?
Oh we sometimes is using blower on da toadies...
Dad don't let us get in da locksy bocksy no more.
He, he, big chuklees when make da toadies fat on da swampy gas.
Humph!
I guess this is what an ogre would call a locked chest.
Come here toady!
Hey you creature..you made da stabbers Dat's good creature!
Well, yes actually, as you asked so nicely. Here you go!
Hey, deese stabbers no good... did you make dem you's self?
Yes, here you go, here's your 'stabbers'.
Dat's not enough, me's an good shot, but need some for practice.
Ahh, der creature has dem... goodly, goodly.
But da chompy not coming without da fatsy toadies...
How do we make the chompys come?
Chompys love da fatsy toadies.
What are 'fatsy toadies'?
Fatsy toadies are da chompy burds bestest yumms.
Where do we put the 'fatsy toadies'?
Over der!
Ok creature? You got dat? Over dere by der no tree's place.
What do you mean 'sneaky..sneaky, stick da chompy?'
Duh! You creature is a bit stoopid yes?
Ok, thanks.
Creature already given Rantz stabbers, Dey's worser at flying dan a dead dog.
Hey you creature, you still here?
Da chompy still not coming!
Dat's a pidy... but maybe Rantz can help da creature?
Dat's a good fatsy toady, now we's need to put it for da chompy to come.
Over 'dere creature, put da toadies over der!
Hey creature got da fatsy toady Is you's gonna stick da chompy?
Yes, I have a 'fatsy toady' for you, here look!
Where should I put the 'fatsy toadies'?
No I haven't got the 'fatsy toady' yet!
There you go, I've placed the bait.
Yes, I know... stick da chompy!
What? I have to get more bait if there's none there?
Does this Chompy Bird even exist I wonder?
Hey, dere's da chompy, I's gonna shoot it.
Grrr...de'ese arrows are rubbish.
Hey there, you keep missing the chompy bird.
I knows, I keeps missing... because your stabbers are worserer at flying than a dead dog.
Oh, keep trying then... you might hit one through pure luck.
Grrrr... You lookin' like a chompy!
Come on, let me have a go...
No, is Rantz stabby thrower... you too weedy...
I'm actually quite strong... please let me try.
Oh, ok...I lend you other stabby thrower...
Or I eat you instead!
Oh suit yourself, you'll just have to go hungry.
Yeah, it's a goodly stabbie chucker, but you's is too weedy to use it like Rantz.
Sqwirk!
Screech!
Sqwark!
Gobble!
Hey You! Got da chompy yet?
Not yet!
Well hurry up and get some, we is hungry!
Hey, Rantz, I've lost the 'stabbie chucker', do you have another one please?
Mee's has, but is not for freeness, dis one cost of da gold coinses.
Yes, I'll buy the bow.
Thanks.
No thanks...
Hey you don't got da coins...come back when you have.
Dat's a great chompy, you musta got a lucky shot wiv da stabbie chucker.
Yep, here's your chompy Bird!
What! Now I've got the chompy bird, you expect me to cook it as well?
Okay's now you's needs to cook da chompy!
But's we's particular about our chompy yumms.
Me's wants Onion. wiv mine!
Yep, da spit's over der!
Last time Rantz did yummies, got very bad, did bad things to food...and belly.
But's we's particular about our chompy yumms. Me's wants Potato wiv mine!
HUH!
Dad say's you's making da chompy for us!
Me's has to have equa leaves wiv mine!
Chompy is our favourite yummms!
Me's has to have cabbage wiv mine!
Have you talked to Dad, he might have something for you to do.
Dad say's you's roastling da chompy for us!
Me's wants tomato wiv mine!
Yummy, can't wait to eats it.
Me's wants doogle leaves wiv mine!
Go talk to Dad, him chasey sneaky chompy.
Hey creature, did you's get da cooked chompy yet?
Hey hey! We got da delicious chompy bird - yay!
Tank's very much for da chompy...
It's my pleasure!

characters.name: Bugs
characters.description: Youthful male ogre, deep gravelly voice with broken grammar, enthusiastic and demanding tone. A young ogre boy who speaks in the distinctive ogre dialect, eagerly bartering feathers for shiny objects.

characters.name: Chompy Bird
characters.description: Bird creature, high-pitched squawking and gobbling sounds, animalistic and wild tone. A large flightless bird that makes various bird noises.

characters.name: Fycie
characters.description: Youthful female ogre, deep but slightly higher-pitched voice with broken grammar, curious and playful tone. Rantz's daughter who speaks in ogre dialect and loves trading feathers for colorful trinkets.

characters.name: Rantz
characters.description: Adult male ogre, deep booming voice with broken grammar and thick accent, gruff and critical tone. A large dim-witted ogre father who constantly criticizes and threatens while demanding help hunting chompy birds.
